name: windowShadeTilt_close
description: This function is used to close the slats of window blinds to a specified angle.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device to close the slats of the window blinds.

parameters.name: ratio
parameters.description: The percentage value to set the slats of the window blinds.
